==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しろ|む|く|yomi=y}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しろむく|白|tr1=shiro|t1=white|無垢|tr2=muku|t2=pure, innocent}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しろむく}}

# A [[huge]], [[heavy]] [[kimono]] [[robe]], sometimes described as a [[white]] [[uchikake]], and worn by [[bride]]s at their [[wedding]]s; a wedding kimono.

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-r|着物|きもの}}: a traditional Japanese robe-like garment, now generally worn only in formal occasions.
* {{ja-r|色打掛|いろ.うちかけ}}, {{ja-r|色打ち掛け|いろ.うちかけ}}: a [[color]]ful, [[long]]-length, [[overgarment]] [[kimono]].
